update_content.zh:
1、更新 Max/Facebook SDK 
2、iOS平台增加 GameCenter 登录
3、新增Debug面板
update_content.en:
1.Update Max/Facebook SDK. 
2.Added GameCenter login for iOS. 
3. Add debug menu.

update_content.zh:
1、修复插屏与激励视频广告时间间隔不生效问题 
2、安卓平台增加 Google Play Games Services 登录
update_content.en:
1.Fixed an issue where the interstitial and rewardVideo AD intervals did not take effect 
2.Added Google Play Games Services login for Android

update_content.zh:
1、支持TopOn/Max双聚合 
2、支持Firebase ABTest
3、支持Google DMA 许可策略 
4、更新 Adjust/Facebook SDK
update_content.en:
1.Supports TopOn/Max dual aggregation 
2.Firebase ABTest is supported. 
3.Support for Google DMA licensing policies. 
 4. Update Adjust/Facebook SDK.

update_content.zh:
1、激励视频没准备好时允许游戏传入提示文字 
2、网络断开时补单逻辑优化
3、新增激励视频/插屏展示接口，允许传string 表示点位
update_content.en:
1.The reward video is not ready to allow the game to pass prompt text. 
2.Optimization of internal purchase replenishment logic when the network is disconnected. 
3.The new reward video/interstitial show interface, allowing string to represent the pos.

update_content.zh:
1、日志开关通过在线参数控制
2、修复json序列化问题
3、新增数数上报参数
update_content.en:
1.Log switch controls 
2.through online parameters, fixes json serialization problems 
3.adds ThinkingData reporting parameters.

update_content.zh: 1、优化激励视频广告，无激励视频时由插屏广告替补
update_content.en: 1.Optimize reward video ads, and replace them with interstitials when there is no reward video.

update_content.zh:
1、优化adjust初始化时机
2、新增firebase崩溃分析
3、修复bug
update_content.en:
1. Optimize the adjust initialization time.
2. Added firebase crash analysis.
3. Fix the bug.

update_content.zh: 1、所有需要填写的ID均改为配置文件读取
update_content.en: 1. All ids to be filled in are read from the configuration file.

update_content.zh: 1、展示激励视频接口新增 toast 弹框参数，默认开启
update_content.en: 1. Add the toast pop-up parameter to the display incentive video interface, which is enabled by default
